codeSent: Verification Code Send To Your Email
enterCode: Enter the 6-digit code we emailed to
codeArrive: Your code will arrive in a few seconds.
compProfileDesc: Your email address is only used for receiving important updates, Your Nickname will be seen by other RIOT Race players.
confirmAge: I confirm that I am 18 years or over and I agree to the terms and conditions.
agreeNews: I agree to receive newsletters and promotional emails from Animoca Brands.
waitText: Please wait while we fetch your account details
finalStepText: For the final step, please verify email account. Check your inbox to complete verification.
fundSafeguarded: Your funds will be safeguarded by security compliant services.
phoneOrEmail: Your phone or email will be used to sign up and login.
loginWithMetaMaskDesc: You are always in control when interacting on RIOT RACERS with METAMASK.
notFoundMetaMask: RIOT RACER has detected that your browser does not have MetaMask installed. MetaMask is widely used by many blockchain applications in order to keep your information secure.
enterEmail: Enter your email to become a Riot Racer!
addressNotAssociated: This Address not associated with this user
emailExit: This email is already associated with another public address.
